title: [Two of a Kind, Entry]
description: Inset with glass panels, a narrow display case, a wide display case, and a tall display case line the eastern and western walls.  A vast assortment of fabrics, leathers, and other adornments are displayed on velvet-draped shelves inside the cases.  Several wooden forms, complete with custom-cobbled footwear, sit on the tops of a short display case and model a variety of shoes using the shop's wares.
